Comment.Content:
Very cool. I'd looked briefly at webrat/mechanize but just went with calling Watir directly from Cucumber.
Very cool that RubyMine supports Cucumber features. Been writing them up in e TextEditor, but having some IDE tooling for this type of stuff will be very handy.
Thanks.
Comment.TargetTitle: Test driven outside in, starting with Cucumber and RubyMine.
Comment.Author: Michael D. Hall
Comment.AuthorUserAgent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 6.1; en-US; rv:1.9.2) Gecko/20100115 Firefox/3.6
